ing: 2 tablespoons fish sauce, or more to taste
2 tablespoons white sugar, or more to taste
1 red chile pepper, thinly sliced, or more to taste (optional)
des: "This favorite Vietnamese dipping sauce goes well with so many things. It doesn't keep well, so make it fresh. The sauce should taste balanced, not too sweet, sour, or salty."
ins: Mix lime juice, fish sauce, sugar, water, red chile pepper, and garlic together in a bowl.
